topic.title: Please increase my ZeroMail max_size
topic.body:
Can you please increase my ZeroMail max_size? I can't send mails anymore (content sign failed: invalid private key.) 

I bet there are many people who don't know what to do if this content sign error pops up, and therefore just stop using zeromail. 

Why not set a default of 100MB or 1GB? The most people have plenty of harddisk space nowadays.

1_18jipjDsfAxAuq4ixbi2w24xJrYVfTYFPn.body: Nice to have people from so many different countries here! ☮

2_1FYXQGLBeNabf5jZHgP4CwzbmJSKaK4oMz.body: I can send you a small amount of namecoin for registering a domain. Or, if you want, I can register the domain for you (for free). http://127.0.0.1:43110/domains4free.bit

Also make sure there are no unnecessary whitespaces in your domain configuration. It should look like this, example: 
**{ "zeronet": { "": "186THqMWuptrZxq1rxzpguAivK3Bs6z84o" } }**
If you have a domain with subdomains, example: 
**{ "zeronet": { "": "186THqMWuptrZxq1rxzpguAivK3Bs6z84o","blog": "1Ajp75FXAxdTzRiRTpdBgd4exvbo4gMW12" } }**

1_12zyC2je1V8Sfq6C5d6CSzUkjYf4bEdva4.body:
> [vahcam](#comment_1_12zyC2je1V8Sfq6C5d6CSzUkjYf4bEdva4): No that is not the question, if I don't use Tor, would surfing here in ZeroNet respects my anonymity ?

I would say, if you don't use some sort of anonymizing tool (tor, vpn, etc.), a skilled 'spy' who understands how zeronet works, is able trace every step you take. He can also find out who initially created and seeded a page. It might not be super easy to do, but it's definitely possible, in my opinion.
